name: concealed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
kept hidden or where it cannot easily be seen: The robbery had been recorded on a concealed security camera. He was carrying a concealed weapon. The room had concealed lighting. See
conceal
More examplesFewer examplesHe said he had a permit to carry a concealed handgun.James was looking forward to seeing her with barely concealed excitement.Builders clambered down into a tunnel leading 12 metres to a concealed entrance.
